_sText:
This is one of my first maps i ever made.
I was inspirated by the other slidemaps like sliderace_techno or sliderace_city, so i created my own map. It takes a long time. This map is not optimised to optimum and contains a few brushwork misstakes, but in gameplay u don't see them.
U see any other great bugs: pls send me a pm.

This map contents:
2155 solids
12592 Faces
562 Point Enteties
449 Solid Enteties
75 unique Textures

The Full Hammer demensions are: 16219 x 9929 x 4040

Its a very Big map:
I hope u have fun playing.

U can upload this map on your server if u want, u don't have to ask.

And sorry for my english im not from England/USA ;)

This is a little youtube video from this map:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KwkyLilw2Ug
